articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Google is testing a vibe-coding app called Opal - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is testing a new vibe-coding tool called Opal, available in the U.S. through Google Labs, that lets users quickly spin up web apps with just a few prompts.
articles.content: AI-powered coding tools have become so popular over the past few months that almost every major tech company is either using one or making its own. Makers of these so-called “vibe-coding” tools are a… [+1381 chars]
